Pass.origin: [the Supreme Court ed on a statute]

1 a.definition: to issue a decision, verdict, or opinion [the Supreme Courton a statute]

2.definition: to go from the control, ownership, or possession of one person or group to that of another [titleto the buyer]

1.definition: to omit a regularly scheduled declaration and payment of (a dividend)

2 a.definition: to get the approval of [the billthe House]

sub_terms.b: to give approval or legal sanction to [the Housethe bill]

3.definition: to transfer the right to or interest in [the salethe title to the goods]

4.definition: to put in circulation [ bad checks] compare

5.definition: to pronounce (as a sentence or judgment) judicially [the courta severe sentence]
